name: .ZCI File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZCI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A ZCI file is a multimedia file retrieved from a ZCI Publishing educational CD-ROM. It contains data that links multiple .TXT files and multimedia assets together into a video presentation and related set of digital encyclopedia entries. ZCI Publishing sold many educational series that consisted of CDs that contained ZCI files.

content: In the 1990s, ZCI Publishing, now known as Zane Publishing, published several series of educational CDs. Some of these series included Revolutions in Art & Music, U.S. Geography, and Concise Encyclopedia.

Each CD contained a ZCI file, which combined the disc's text and multimedia files into a presentation and a set of related encyclopedia entries. Each CD also contained the program PowerCD (sometimes referred to as PowerCD Explorer), which learners could use to view the disc's content.

instructions: You can open a ZCI file with ZCI Publishing PowerCD (Windows). However, PowerCD is discontinued, and 64-bit versions of Windows cannot run it. Therefore, you may not be able to open your ZCI files in modern versions of Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
